about_the_game:
Join the official Discord server



As a highly advanced weapons entity, your mission as the Falconet is to take on an army of rogue machines and rescue humans trapped behind enemy lines. To accomplish your mission, you will need to rapidly switch between your diverse arsenal of weapons to quickly eliminate your enemies… before they eliminate you.



Progress through diverse levels as you unlock doors and solve puzzles.



Find and rescue the humans trapped deep within each level.

Features

  • Diverse weapons each with unique abilities
  • No ammo limits! Use the weapon you need without having to worry about running out of ammo
  • Varied enemies
  • Combos and high scores will keep you coming back for more
  • Level progression puzzles
  • Sega Genesis / Mega Drive style graphics
  • Classic chip tune soundtrack
  • More features still under development...

name: Falconet Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Falconet is a retro-style twin stick shooter with smooth weapon switching and quick reaction gameplay. Travel through unique levels, solve puzzles, and use your diverse arsenal of weapons to efficiently eliminate an army of rogue machines, rescue human survivors, and rack up high scores.
